long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you:
1. Automatically sync your LinkedIn connections with Village. Otherwise it would take you hours to export/import your connections every week.
2. Show reliable warm intros to people and companies you research across the web.

Village is the AI-powered network for founders.
Fundraise, recruit and sell 10x faster by discovering warm intros in your network you never knew existed.

To sign-up go to: https://village.do

Privacy and Safety is our #1 priority.
Village respects your privacy and is dedicated to keeping your data secure. We comply with GDPR and CCPA. Our security and privacy practices are reviewed by Drata in this security report: 
https://app.drata.com/security-report/1f79fe0c-ad86-4bce-9901-00a152c2fbac/dc635c60-966d-48f8-b481-d33253e28930?region=NA

We are improving the app daily. We appreciate your feedback. Reach out to our support team at support@village.do for any issues.
